tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    file_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES files(file_id)
)

CREATE TABLE files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR,
    file_size INT,
    user_id INT,
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs ( 
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INT, 
  activity_type VARCHAR(50), 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  file_id INT 
);

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    file_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    signup_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(100),
    file_size INT,
    upload_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
